review: This is a nifty little device. It was fairly easy to hook up and use. There's an app for the phone and also a plugin for the chrome browser. This second part allows you to send anything you are watching/looking at in your browser on to the tv.It can sometimes hang a bit (as expected) if your wifi signal isn't the strongest.
